text: What happened to the new book partially tape-recorded by his publishers in March of last year? Still a skeleton. Yet I have before me now a 12,000-word manuscript of a book planned to be called Confessions of an Irish Rebel which was delivered to his agents in June. IT begins:"There was a party to celebrate Deirdre's return from her abortion in Bristol."
handwritten_text: What happened to the new book partially tape-recorded by his publishers in March of last year? Still a skeleton. Yet I have before me now a 12,000-word manuscript of a book planned to be called Confessions of an Irish Rebel which was delivered to his agents in June. IT begins:"There was a party to celebrate Deirdre's return from her abortion in Bristol."
